metadata.title: CVE-2020-15503 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
LibRaw before 0.20-RC1 lacks a thumbnail size range check. This affectsdecoders/unpack_thumb.cpp, postprocessing/mem_image.cpp, andutils/thumb_utils.cpp. For example,malloc(sizeof(libraw_processed_image_t)+T.tlength) occurs withoutvalidating T.tlength.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
libraw20 - 0.20.2-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.2-2ubuntu2').
darktable package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
